The Protectobots:



Exiting the holographic training room in the Maximal City, Hot Spot looked to 
the others.  "Well, that was interesting.  Never knew holograms could hurt so 
much," he said, pointing to a small cut in his side that had healed up pretty 
quickly but was still obvious.

"Well, they can.  If you take the safety settings off!" First Aid yelled.  
"Why butcher your body when you don't need to?"

"It's more realistic if it hurts." Blades said.  "Who wants to play a game 
involving war if you're a hundred percent invincible.

"I'll second that." Streetwise said.  "As long as there aren't chances of us 
actually dying."

"Yeah." Groove said.  "As much as I enjoy having fun, shouldn't we report in?"

"Yes, Groove is right.  We need to obtain duties in this large base." Hot 
Spot said, opening up a comm. link with Iron Raptor.  "Iron Raptor, this is 
Hot Spot of the gestalt team Protectobots.  I and my team request orders."
